title: Stones River National Battlefield: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things to Do     Guided Tours               Guided Tours          Park rangers and volunteers offer guided tours of the battlefield on a regular basis from may through October. Most battlefield tours are caravan tours. Visitors follow the tour leader in their own vehicles. There are also occassional walking and bike tours. See the Schedule of Events for dates and times. Special group tours, including staff rides for military groups, may be offered based of staff availability. Contact us to schedule a special battlefield tour.
